pages.text: The Walton County Fair has been a cornerstone of our community since 1924. Celebrating 100 years, our fair promotes agriculture, home arts, and community spirit through various events and activities. Learn more about our rich history and dedicated volunteers.

2025
Featured
March 1 @ 9:00 am
-
3:00 pm
DeFuniak Springs Home and Garden Show
Walton County Fair Grounds
790 N. 9th Street, 					DeFuniak Springs
Join us on Saturday, March 1, 2025, for the DeFuniak Springs Home and Garden Show at the Walton County Fairgrounds! Enjoy a day of local craft artisans, plants, garden supplies, home décor, food trucks, and more. Free entry, with donations appreciated. Don’t miss this exciting community event!
Free
Jan
6
2025
January 6
Annual Meeting – Walton County Fair Association
Walton County Fair Grounds
790 N. 9th Street, 					DeFuniak Springs
Join us for the Walton County Fair Association’s annual meeting on Monday, January 6, 2025, at the Walton County Fairgrounds. All interested individuals are encouraged to attend. Contact us at info@waltoncountyfair.com or call +1 (850) 892-5261 for more information.
Oct
19
2024
October 19, 2024 @ 12:00 pm
-
9:30 pm
Walton County Fair – Final Day & Special Events
Walton County Fair Grounds
790 N. 9th Street, 					DeFuniak Springs
Join us for the final day of the Walton County Fair with the Youth Beef Show, live performances by Maddox Davidson and Brant McCollough, and New Heights Wrestling. Note: Midway rides will be closed from 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM for state inspection, and a new armband is required after 6:00 PM.

Celebrating community, heritage, and arts since 1924.
Join us at the Walton County Fair for another exciting year of
fun, education, and tradition
. Thank you for supporting our
non-profit organization
and helping us preserve
Walton County’s rich traditions
for generations to come.
